section.p: ‘This one’ll do nicely,’ says one of the dark figures and they reach for you with coal-black hands.
More trau boil up out of the ground behind you, and you are seized, trussed up, and dragged underground before you can say ‘By Elnir’s Thunder!’

if.if: If you are 8th Rank or higher, turn to .

section.p: If you are of lower Rank, or if you don’t have Into the Underworld, .
